resources.string: Self Education Test
1. What do your friends value on you?

string-array.name: question_0_options
string-array.item: Because you are a faithful and loyal friend;
Strong and ready to stand up for friends in difficult times;

resources.string: 2. Choose which characteristic is most suitable for you:
3. How do you feel about the idea of keeping a personal diary, planning your work for the year, month, next week, day?

string-array.name: question_2_options
string-array.item: I think that most of the time it\'s a waste of time;
I tried to do it, but not regularly;
Positively, since I have been doing this for a long time.

resources.string: 4. What is the main obstacle for you to improve professionally, to study better?

string-array.name: question_3_options
string-array.item: There is no suitable literature and conditions;
Not always enough willpower and perseverance.

resources.string: 5. What are the typical reasons for your mistakes and misses?

string-array.name: question_4_options
string-array.item: I do not know for sure.

resources.string: 6. Choose characteristic most suitable for you:
7. Choose characteristic most suitable for you:
8. Choose characteristic most suitable for you:
9. Choose qualities most developed in you:
10. What do you usually do when you have free time?

string-array.name: question_9_options
string-array.item: I do my favorite thing, I have a hobby;
I spend time with friends, or with my family.

resources.string: 11. What of the following areas is of your cognitive interest?
12. Who would you most like to realize yourself?
13. What did your teachers think of you?
14. Which of the three principles is closest to you?

string-array.name: question_13_options
string-array.item: Live to know more and be able to do;

resources.string: 15. Who is closest to your ideal?

string-array.name: question_14_options
string-array.item: A person is healthy, strong in spirit;
A man who knows and knows a lot;
The person is independent and self-assured.

resources.string: 16. Will you succeed in life achieve what you dream?
17. What movies do you like most?
18. Imagine that you earned a million. How would you prefer to spend it?

string-array.name: question_17_options
string-array.item: I would travel and see the world;
I would go abroad to study or invest money in my favorite business;
I would buy a cottage with a swimming pool, furniture, a chic car and live for my own pleasure.

resources.string: \t\tThe application is a test to identify the ability for independent learning and self-development. \n\t\tIt consists of 18 questions, to answer which you are free in any sequence. You can also return to the questions already answered.
